ABOUT US
Cielito Artisan Pops was founded in Wynwood-Miami in 2017, as a way to share our passion for creative and tasty sweets with out community. We are a Family run business and thank you for trying our treats and help our dream come true.
-Sindy & Ivan-
Co-Owner Sindy Posso was determined to open her first shop in Wynwood, as it would be the perfect backdrop to combine her background in architecture with art and great food.
Aside from her passion for architecture and design, Sindy has also had a love for baking from a young age. She grew up in Colombia surrounded by a family of bakers, so it’s no surprise she decided to go into this industry. At Cielito Sindy keeps it in the family, working alongside her husband, mother and father to incorporate decades-old family recipes. Customers can watch these recipes take shape through the large window within the Wynwood shop. This not only allows people to feel like they’re part of the process, but it also emphasizes the transparency and openness that is true to the Cielito name.
Ivan, her husband, is that wonderful guy that always makes her dreams come true! You can see them both around the shops helping customers and making popsicles.

BOOK US
TODAY
BOOK US TODAY
We would be delighted to be part of your event! To receive a detailed and accurate quote, please email us at
[email protected]
with the following information:
1. Your name and a phone number to contact you if we need more details.
2. Type of event
(corporate or personal)
3. Number of pops required
4. Whether you need a cart and server
5. If you would like the pops to be branded
(sticks and stickers)
5. If you would like the pops
to be branded
(sticks and stickers)
6. Event date and duration
Kindly ensure all details are included to facilitate a smooth and efficient booking process. We look forward to making your event a memorable one
